infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to scan VIN codes and take photos of vehicle diagnostics.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to show nearby mechanics, services, and traffic reports.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs location access to provide real-time traffic updates and nearby service recommendations.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow AutoGhana to access your camera to scan VIN codes and capture diagnostic images.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow AutoGhana to use your location to find nearby mechanics and provide traffic updates.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow AutoGhana to use your location to find nearby services.
